summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the improvement of 8th Avenue North, from Mercer Street to 120 feet north of Roy Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8039 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
